member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.SessionHelper
member.summary: The purpose of this static class is to provide a conduit to integrating with the user session and obtaining customer user session data or geo ip data, if required

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.CurrentUserLocationMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of active user sessions, including longitude and latitude for display on a map, this data can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.PageVisitMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of active page views for the website by all active sessions and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SalesByCountry
member.summary:
Returns a list of all sales from the active user sessions and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.UserDetailsMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of detailed information of all active sessions currently active within the website and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.UserSessionTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing user session requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.UserSessionTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by UserSession.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.VisitsByCountry
member.summary:
Returns a list of visitor count, by country and whether it's a bot or not and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionMiddleware
member.summary:
UserSession Middleware.
This class is inserted into the request pipeline and manages all User Session data.

member.name: T:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionSettings
member.summary: Contains settings that are required by the UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin module.

member.name: P:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionSettings.StaticFileExtensions
member.summary: Contains a delimited list of static file extensions

member.name: P:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionSettings.CookieName
member.summary: Name of cookie used to store user session data.

member.name: P:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionSettings.EncryptionKey
member.summary: Encryption key used for encrypting user session data that is stored within a cookie.

member.name: P:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionSettings.SessionTimeout
member.summary:
Number of minutes the sessions is valid for.
Default: 30 minutes. Minimuum: 15 minutes. Maximum: 200 minutes.

member.name: P:UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin.UserSessionSettings.DefaultCulture
member.summary: Default culture used for the user session.
